item.title: EP 673 - Scales Of Justice: Are All Cops Reptilians?
item.itunes:title: Scales Of Justice: Are All Cops Are Reptilians?
item.description:
Today we meet 9 inch tall alien vampires from Java, and then we find out that reptilians will stop at nothing to save the windows of the world!
